snippet: Kenneth L. Miller was charged with abetting international kidnapping in a case involving same-sex unions and conservative Christian opposition to homosexuality.
abstract: Federal jury in Burlington, Vt, finds Amish-Mennonite pastor Kenneth L Miller guilty of abetting international parental kidnapping; he is convicted of helping Lisa A Miller flee the country with her young daughter to evade a same-sex parent custody battle.

byline.contributor: Jason McLure contributed reporting from Burlington, Vt.

lead_paragraph: Kenneth L. Miller was charged with abetting international kidnapping in a case involving same-sex unions and conservative Christian opposition to homosexuality.

headline.seo: Pastor Kenneth L. Miller Convicted in Parental Kidnapping Case
headline.main: Sect Pastor Is Convicted of Assisting in Abduction
headline.print_headline: Sect Pastor Is Convicted Of Assisting In Abduction

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
